name: Flat
definition: A musical symbol lowers a pitch by one half step.

name: Interval
definition: The difference in pitch between two sounds. This difference is a melodic interval if the two pitches sound successively and a harmonic interval if the pitches sound simultaneously.

name: Window
definition: A type of a function that tracks amplitiude over time.

name: Grain
definition: A very short, windowed excerpt of a sound file.
